title: FTX SBF Effective Altruism Network Regulatory Capture
description: Research the systematic capture of academic institutions, think tanks, and regulatory bodies through Sam Bankman-Fried's Effective Altruism network, including MIT, Stanford, Georgetown, and regulatory influence operations through campaign contributions and academic partnerships. Focus on how EA ideology masked traditional kleptocratic wealth extraction.
next_steps: Web search for FTX political donations
research_notes: High priority - represents modern crypto kleptocracy with academic/regulatory capture elements
